definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Sarraut and Flandin had the impulse to act at once by general mobilization.
sentences.chinese: 薩羅和弗朗丹有種實行全國總動員的衝動。

sentences.english: Then he put Nemo and many fish to a big tank.
sentences.chinese: 然後他把海底總動員和許多魚類的一個大罐。

sentences.english: It was Toy Story's Buzz Lightyear made flesh.
sentences.chinese: 這是玩具總動員的巴斯光年了肉。

sentences.english: In the Toy Story movies, I am Buzz Lightyear's good friend.
sentences.chinese: 在《玩具總動員》電影中，我是巴斯光年的好朋友。

sentences.english: Please bring me a cute fish too, like the ones in “Finding Nemo.
sentences.chinese: 還請給我一條可愛的魚，像《海底總動員》裏的那種。

sentences.english: He has worked on Monsters, Inc. and The Incredibles.
sentences.chinese: 作品有《怪獸電力公司》與《超人總動員》。

sentences.english: Such a revelation occurs in the first Toy Story.
sentences.chinese: 在玩具總動員的第一集終出現了相似的情形。

sentences.english: The first in the time travel series is unimprovable.
sentences.chinese: 玩具總動員系列的每一集都是經典。

definition: striving to be first and fearing to be last (idiom); outdoing one another
social movement/abbr. for 社會運動|社会运动
Taibei or Taipei, capital of Taiwan
Formosa (from Ilha Formosa, "Beautiful Isle", the name given to Taiwan Island by passing Portuguese mariners in 1544)
(of a sports competition or match) to commence/(of a war or battle) to break out/to perform acrobatic or choreographed fighting (in Chinese opera)/to brawl/to come to blows
Hengchun Peninsula in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], the southernmost point of Taiwan
variant of 策劃|策划[ce4 hua4]
